message.content:
Explore the entire NeuroSense (Neuro360) codebase and provide a comprehensive summary of ALL features, pages, components, and functionalities. Look at:

1. All pages in src/pages/
2. All components in src/components/
3. User roles and dashboards
4. Assessment types
5. Authentication system
6. Any API integrations
7. Brain wellness features
8. Coaching features
9. Progress tracking
10. Any other unique features

Be thorough and search through multiple files to get a complete picture. Set thoroughness level to "very thorough".

content.text: I'll conduct a very thorough exploration of the Neuro360 codebase to provide you with a comprehensive summary of all features, pages, components, and functionalities.

# COMPREHENSIVE SUMMARY: NeuroSense (Neuro360) Platform

## Platform Overview
**NeuroSense360** (also branded as "Limitless Brain Wellness" by Dr. Sweta Adatia) is a comprehensive brain health and wellness platform that combines clinical-grade brain assessments (qEEG), personalized brain optimization protocols, coaching services, and progress tracking. The platform serves multiple user types including clinics, patients, and super administrators.

---

## CORE FEATURES & FUNCTIONALITIES

### 1. USER ROLES & DASHBOARDS

#### **Super Admin Dashboard** (D:\Neuro360-10-12-2025-15.47pm\Neuro360\src\components\admin\SuperAdminPanel.jsx)
**Features:**
- Clinic Management - Approve, activate, deactivate clinics
- Patient Reports - View and manage all patient reports across clinics
- Payment History - Track payments and subscriptions
- Analytics Dashboard - System-wide analytics and metrics
- Advanced Analytics - Deep-dive analytics and tracking
- Alert Dashboard - System alerts and monitoring
- Algorithm Data Processor - Process brain wellness data
- Data Access Center - Centralized data management
- Branding Configuration - Co-labeling and white-label settings
- Notification Center - System notifications
- Agreement Manager - Manage clinic agreements
- System Settings - Global configuration

#### **Clinic Admin Dashboard** (D:\Neuro360-10-12-2025-15.47pm\Neuro360\src\components\clinic\ClinicDashboard.jsx)
**Features:**
- Overview Tab - Clinic statistics and quick metrics
- Patient Management - Add, edit, delete patients
- Report Viewer - View and manage patient reports
- Subscription Management - Handle clinic subscriptions and billing
- Usage Tracking - Monitor report usage vs. allocation
- Advanced Analytics - Clinic-specific analytics
- Care Plan Generator - Create personalized care plans
- Clinical Report Forms - Generate clinical reports for patients

#### **Patient Dashboard** (D:\Neuro360-10-12-2025-15.47pm\Neuro360\src\components\patient\PatientDashboard.jsx)
**Features:**
- Profile Management - View and update personal information
- Clinical Reports - Access brain wellness reports
- Appointment Booking - Schedule sessions
- Progress Tracking - Monitor brain wellness journey
- Resources - Educational materials
- Journey Timeline - Track wellness milestones
- Clinic Information - View assigned clinic details
- Report Downloads - Download qEEG and assessment reports

---

### 2. BRAIN WELLNESS (LBW - Limitless Brain Wellness) MODULE

#### **LBW Dashboard** (D:\Neuro360-10-12-2025-15.47pm\Neuro360\src\pages\LBWDashboard.jsx)
- Brain Fitness Score (out of 100)
- Focus, Memory, and Mood metrics
- Weekly Progress Charts
- Recent Activity Log
- Quick Actions (Daily Check-in, Assessments, Coaching, Content)
- Upcoming Sessions
- Achievement Tracking

#### **Assessments** (D:\Neuro360-10-12-2025-15.47pm\Neuro360\src\pages\LBWAssessments.jsx)
**Available Assessment Types:**
1. **ADHD Rating Scale** - 18 questions, ~15 min
2. **GAD-7 Anxiety Scale** - 7 questions, ~5 min
3. **Perceived Stress Scale (PSS-10)** - 10 questions, ~10 min
4. **Memory & Cognitive Assessment** - 6 tasks, ~20 min
5. **Mood & Emotional Regulation** - 5 sections, ~12 min
6. **Complete Assessment Suite** - All assessments combined

**Features:**
- Evidence-based scientifically validated assessments
- Personalized insights and recommendations
- Progress tracking over time
- Assessment history with scores

#### **Coaching Services** (D:\Neuro360-10-12-2025-15.47pm\Neuro360\src\pages\LBWCoaching.jsx)
**Coaching Types:**
- Brain Coaching - Focus, executive function, cognitive performance ($80+/session)
- Nervous System Coaching - Stress regulation, trauma recovery ($90+/session)
- qEEG Consultation - Brain mapping and neurofeedback ($150+/session)

**Coach Profiles Include:**
- Specialty areas (ADHD, Memory, Stress, Wellness)
- Ratings and session count
- Availability status
- Bio and credentials
- Session booking

#### **Progress Tracking** (D:\Neuro360-10-12-2025-15.47pm\Neuro360\src\pages\LBWProgress.jsx)
- Weekly/Monthly performance trends
- Metric tracking (Overall, Focus, Memory, Mood)
- Milestone achievements
- Progress insights and suggestions
- Goal tracking with progress bars
- Best performance time analysis

#### **Content Library** (D:\Neuro360-10-12-2025-15.47pm\Neuro360\src\pages\LBWContent.jsx)
**Content Types:**
- Articles - Educational brain health content
- Videos - Guided exercises and tutorials
- Podcasts - Expert interviews and insights
- Exercises - Interactive brain training
- Research - Latest scientific findings

**Features:**
- Curated collections (Beginner's Journey, Advanced Techniques, etc.)
- Premium and free content
- Search and category filtering
- Content ratings and view counts
